snippet: The acquisition of Paradigm, a software company focused on the oil and natural gas industry, will allow Apax Partners and JMI Equity to take advantage of a push by energy companies to find new resources.
abstract: The acquisition of Paradigm, a software company focused on the oil and natural gas industry, will allow Apax Partners and JMI Equity to take advantage of a push by energy companies to find new resources.

headline.main: Apax and JMI Equity to Buy Paradigm for $1 Billion
